state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, go east. Then, make an attempt to go to the south. After that, try to head south. With that over with, travel south. With that done, make an effort to travel west. Then, make an effort to venture west. Okay, and then, go south. Then, head west. And then, try to go west. After that, make an attempt to move north. And then, try to take a trip north. With that done, go to the east. And then, attempt to go to the east. Okay, and then, retrieve the hat from the floor of the attic. That's it! -= Shower =- You've entered a shower. You scan the room for a trunk, and you find a trunk. The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever! There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Shower =-0/1
next_state: -= Studio =- You are in a studio. A standard one. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west. > -= Studio =-0/2

What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it? You can see a board. The board is standard. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. You see a counter. The counter is shiny. However, the counter, like an empty counter, has nothing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the counter. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Laundromat =-0/3
